title: HELP S champion shard for lvling up not showing
body:
In the past week I have got 2 S's but the shards don't show up. All it says when I open loot is: 
ERROR :( Unable to retrieve some loot item data. Items may appear without icons or names. If so try restarting your client. 
I've restarted my client 3 times and it didn't work.
PLEASE tell me if your know how to fix this because I want to lvl kan to lvl 7.
Now later I played a game and got another s and this time it gave me a shard but the other 2 times it didn't? do u know why?
thx

replies.body: I've responded to your other post [here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/kN7Mf7X3-s-champion-lvling-up-shard-glitch) and can work with you there if you have any questions!
